For built-in apps that you cannot get updates for in Play Store, which includes Phone, Contacts, Settings, etc., Built-in App Updates would check their versions and push app updates to you via notifications when there is an urgent update, which aims to improve app stability. You can disable it anytime by just going to Settings > System > Experience improvement programmes > Built-in App Updates.

Allow OnePlus to check for and push built-in app updates to you to improve app stability. For built-in apps that you cannot get updates for in Play Store, which includes Phone, Contacts, Settings, etc., Built-in App Updates would check their versions and push app updates to you via notifications when there is an urgent update, which aims to improve app stability. You can disable it anytime by just going to Settings > System > Experience improvement programmes > Built-in App Updates.
Allow OnePlus to check for and push built-in app updates to you to improve app stability.
Bind your device to join this OnePlus inner circle, get rewards, a premium experience and exclusive offers

Binding your device requires access to your IMEI number to verify the device. The number will not be used for other purposes and your data will be kept strictly confidential. Please refer to the Privacy Policy for more information.
For better connection with us, OnePlus may send you surveys and product updates by push notifications.

"In order to maintain good communication with OnePlus product users and provide official news or product information, OnePlus may use push notification services. These services deliver OnePlus official news, product information and surveys. You can turn off this feature at any time by going to Settings > System > Experience improvement programmes > OnePlus Notifications."

Enabling OnePlus Service Messaging offers you a chance to enjoy better cloud services and other features by ensuring data synchronisation for every second. You can disable it anytime by just going to Settings > System > Experience improvement programmes > OnePlus Service Messaging.
Allow OnePlus to deliver prompt cloud messaging services to you to ensure an optimised product experience
I agree to the terms of the Privacy Policy and End User Licence Agreement

"Before using your OnePlus device, please read the following terms carefully. Tap the title for details. Once you start using your OnePlus device, you have indicated that you agree to and accept OnePlus's Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not continue using your OnePlus device. You can return the device to OnePlus and receive a refund in accordance with OnePlus's Return Policy."
Pushing notifications related to OnePlus system services, including OnePlus Service Messaging and Built-in App Updates.

Learn how OnePlus can analyse how you use your phone to improve your experience.
"Learn how OnePlus can use your phone's error logs to improve your phone's performance."
System updates have been completed. OnePlus will continue to enhance the user experience, bring a more secure system environment, and provide a better protection for your personal data and privacy.
Guide of OnePlus User Privacy Updates

Join the System Stability Program to help us locate issues with our OS faster.

Join the System Stability Program so OnePlus can continue to improve our products. We will not use the information for personal identity recognition and we will not share your information with any third party for any purpose. After choosing to share system error data with OnePlus, you can still opt out at any time.

"Sharing system error log information with us helps us to improve our products. Because of certain design characteristics in the Android system, when you share this information with us, there is a small possibility that some personal information may be attached, such as your telephone number, email address or Facebook account number. Unfortunately, this is beyond our control, but it is also extremely unlikely. Any data OnePlus does collect is only retained for the time required for it to be analysed. We will not use it for personal identity recognition and we will not share your information with any third party for any purpose. Your decision as to whether or not you wish to share wrong system log information with us will have no implications for your future dealings with OnePlus. After choosing to share system error data with OnePlus, you can still stop the process at any time. To do so, simply go to Settings – Advanced – Join System Stability Improvement Program, and unselect the checkbox. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to learn more about information collection and processing."
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread

OnePlus will ensure you receive timely updates for all the built-in apps in your device, e.g. Phone, Contacts, Settings, etc. Built-in apps will receive push app updates via notifications to improve app stability. You can disable it at any time under Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes> Built-in App Updates.
Allow OnePlus to check for push built-in app updates to improve app stability.

Participate in the OnePlus Co-Creation Labs to get the latest information and enhanced system experience. By joining, you agree to the terms and conditions. This feature can be disabled under Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes.
For two-way communication, OnePlus may send surveys and product updates via push notifications.

To maintain two-way communication with OnePlus users and provide official news or product information, OnePlus may use push notification services. These services deliver OnePlus news and surveys now and then. You can disable it anytime under Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes> OnePlus Notifications.
A community of dreamers and pioneers. Become a member of Red Cable Club to enjoy exclusive benefits and rewards. Created for you, by you.
To bind your device, Red Cable Club needs access to IMEI number for verification. This data will not be used for any other purposes. Please refer to the Privacy Policy for more information.

Enable OnePlus Service Messaging to enjoy better cloud services by ensured data synchronisation every second. You may disable it at any time under Settings> Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes> Built-in App Updates.
Allow OnePlus to deliver prompt cloud messaging services for optimised product experience.

Before starting, please read the terms and conditions carefully. Terms of service are the legal agreements between a service provider and a person who wants to use that service. The person must agree to abide by the terms of service in order to use the offered service. Terms of service can also be merely a disclaimer, especially regarding the use of websites.
I agree to the Privacy Policy and End User Licence Agreement

Join the user experience programme to create the finest product design and user experience. OnePlus will not use your information for personal identity recognition purposes. You may choose to opt out of the programme at any time.
Allow OnePlus to check for and push built-in app updates to you to improve app stability.

Participate in OnePlus Co-creation User Programmes to get the latest information and a better system experience. By agreeing to join, you accept all the items below. You can disable it under Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes.

"Participate in OnePlus co-creation user programmes to help OnePlus improve system or application design, get the latest news and product information, quickly synchronise cloud service data and receive fast and stable application updates. You can disable it under Settings> System> Experience improvement programmes. Participate in OnePlus co-creation user programmes?"
For better communication, OnePlus may send you official news, product information, questionnaires, etc., through notifications.
Allow OnePlus to deliver prompt cloud messaging services to you to ensure optimised product experience.
Join the System Stability Programme so OnePlus can continue to improve its products.

You can restrict access to apps and content from your account
Users have their own apps and content

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with apps, wallpaper and so on. Users can also adjust device settings such as Wi‑Fi that affect everyone.
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users. Accessibility settings and services may not transfer to the new user."

"When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users."

Join the User Experience Program so OnePlus can continue to improve our product design and overall user experience. OnePlus promises it will never use the information for personal identity recognition. After deciding to join the plan, you can still opt out at any time.
"Before you can create a restricted profile, you'll need to set up a screen lock to protect your apps and personal data."
Make sure that the person is available to take the device and set up their space.
